name: Mazes Cubed
description:
Controls:

Left click and drag to rotate maze.

Mouse wheel to zoom in and out.

Modifications made:

  1. Created new scripts to control doors and keys that you have to roll into doors to unlock them.
  2. Created 5 Levels to make up the "First World" of the game.
  3. Created 2 Levels to make up the "Second World" of the game.

Credits:

Declan McClintock

BOXOPHOBIC - For the Skybox used

FoolBoyMedia - For the in game music used
